name: Bass (フォルテ)
locations: Defeat Bass SP in Graveyard Area. (Gregar exclusive)

name: BigHook (ギガントフック)
locations: Obtain from email when you enter the Graveyard Area. (Gregar exclusive)

name: DeltaRay (デルタレイエッジ)
description: A button power up by 3 sword.
locations: Purchase from NetDealer in Graveyard Area for 30,000 Z. (Gregar exclusive)

name: ColForce (カーネルフォース)
description: Summon Colonel army in open panels.
locations: Defeat Bass BX in Underground Area 2. (Gregar exclusive)

name: BugRSwrd (バグライズソード)
description: Use Bug Frag with DrkSword! (Sword; if 0 Bug Frags remained)
locations: Purchase from BugFrag Trader in Sky Area 1 for 100 BugFrags. (Gregar exclusive)

name: BassAnly (フォルテアナザー)
locations: Defeat Bass SP in Graveyard Area. (Falzar exclusive)

name: MetrKnuk (メテオナックル)
locations: Obtain from email when you enter the Graveyard Area. (Falzar exclusive)

name: CrossDiv (クロスディバイド)
locations: Purchase from NetDealer in Graveyard Area for 30,000 Z. (Falzar exclusive)

name: HubBatc (サイトバッチ)
locations: Defeat Bass BX in Underground Area 2. (Falzar exclusive)

name: BgDthThd (バグデスサンダー)
description: Use Bug Frag with DrkThnd! (Thunder; if 0 Bug Frags remained)
locations: Purchase from BugFrag Trader in Sky Area 1 for 100 BugFrags. (Falzar exclusive)
